name: IT: The Game
description:
Developer's Note:

This is a very early build- basically you can just explore the town of Derry and get a bit of information/commentary in each location.  

                                                      *****

IT: The Game is a fangame based on the 2017 movie.

It’s Summer, 1989. Batman is in theaters. New Kids on the Block is on the radio. Oh, and your parents have just moved you to a small town in Maine called Derry.

Make friends with the members of the Losers Club, try to avoid bullies, explore the town of Derry and learn about its troubling history... and try to deal with this f*cking clown you keep seeing. Come with me and you'll float too!
